results.overview: Ren MacCormack is transplanted from Boston to the small southern town of Bomont where loud music and dancing are prohibited. Not one to bow to the status quo, Ren challenges the ban, revitalizing the town and falling in love with the minister’s troubled daughter Ariel in the process.
results.title: Footloose

results.overview: When teenager Ren and his family move from big-city Chicago to a small town in the West, he's in for a real case of culture shock after discovering he's living in a place where music and dancing are illegal.
results.title: Footloose

results.overview: Department-store models Flo and Marian set their sights on wealthy young soft-drink magnate J. A. Smith. Through a misunderstanding, they pick on the wrong J. A. Smith, a fortune hunter himself who assumes that Marian is a wealthy widow. Meanwhile, Marian falls for the real Smith, never dreaming that he's the millionaire.
results.title: Footloose Widows

results.overview: A rich businessman brings home a homeless man who promises to tame his willful 18-year-old daughter.
results.title: The Footloose Heiress

results.overview: A wildlife adventure about a fox cub who teams with a badger to survive wilderness dangers.
results.title: The Footloose Fox

results.overview: A pinioned trout-farm goose takes a wild gander for her mate. But when he's blown off course in a storm, and then winged, he's going to have to make his way back to her on foot, past predators and customs officers. Meanwhile, the trout farmers worry about their goose raising a brood on her own and a pretty young woman who's come to fly fish.
results.title: The Footloose Goose

results.overview: A fan remake of the 1984 film Footloose.
results.title: Our Footloose Remake

results.original_title: Bill Bruford's Earthworks ‎– Footloose In NYC
results.overview: Footloose In NYC gives the viewer the whole Earthworks experience with live concert footage as well as exclusive interviews and backstage footage.
results.title: Bill Bruford's Earthworks ‎– Footloose In NYC

results.original_title: Footloose in Ireland: Dingle Way & Dublin
results.overview: UK filmmakers Debra and David Rixon explore Ireland's beautiful west coast, hiking on the Dingle Way. Local folk give a wonderful outline of the history, music and culture of this remote gaelic-speaking region. In part 2, the couple enjoy Dublin's historic streets on a spirited walking trail, visiting the Guinness Storehouse, Dublin Castle and take a ride on a USA-built DUKW
results.title: Footloose in Ireland: Dingle Way & Dublin

results.overview: A chance meeting between Vantar, who succeeded his father as leader of the clan, and the beautiful Gypsy woman Maira triggers the beginning of a passionate love. But he is not the only one who desires her.
results.title: My Brothers, Footloose Tramps

results.overview: A lonely 17 year old boy is looking for a couple who is ready to adopt him.
results.title: Venetian Lies
